DataElement.preferredName: Tissue Specimen Research Consent Unrelated Ind-3
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator that asks whether the patient's tissue may be kept for research about other health problems (e.g., causes of diabetes, Alzheimer's disease, and heart disease).

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to consent for the use of a tissue specimen for research.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: is an organ part that consists of similarly specialized cells and intercellular matrix, aggregated according to specific spatial relationships; together with other tissues, it constitutes an organ component. Example(s): epithelium, muscle(tissue), connective tissue, neural tissue, lymphoid tissue.:Specimen; a bit of tissue or blood or urine that is taken or used for research purposes.

Concepts.definition: An anatomical structure consisting of similarly specialized cells and intercellular matrix, aggregated according to genetically determined spatial relationships, performing a specific function.

A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.

Property.preferredDefinition: Systematic investigation into a subject in order to discover facts, to establish or revise a theory, or to develop a plan of action based on the facts discovered.:Permission to do something.

Concepts.definition: Systematic investigation into a subject in order to discover facts, to establish or revise a theory, or to develop a plan of action based on the facts discovered.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: patients' acknowledgement and acceptance of participation in a clinical trial.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or unknown.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 4-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reeves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 3/35/2016 jk removed "indeterminate" value that was added in error. 7/7/2021wz: added ALT VM name for HOPE-CARE project.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Patient's Initial Consent giv
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient's Initial Consent given for tissue specimen use for research unrelated to the patient's cancer?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Your tissue samples may be used for research about other diseases

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient's Initial Consent given for specimen use for research unrelated to the patient's cancer

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text6
ReferenceDocuments.description: My tissue may be kept for use in research about other health problems (for example: diabetes, Alzheimer's disease, or heart disease)

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text4
ReferenceDocuments.description:
My tissue specimens (if available) may be kept for use in research to learn about, prevent, or treat other health
problems (for example: diabetes, Alzheimer's disease, or heart disease).

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has given permission to the Alliance to collect and store his/her tissue samples for use in future research to learn about, prevent, or treat other health problems (for example: diabetes, Alzheimer's disease, or heart disease)

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has given permission to store and use his/her tissue(s) sample for use in future research to learn about, prevent, or treat other health problems (for example: diabetes, Alzheimer's disease, or heart disease)

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text8
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has given permission to store and use their tissue sample(s) for use in future research to learn about, prevent, or treat other health problems (for example: diabetes, Alzheimer's disease, or heart disease)

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has given permission to store and use tissue sample(s) for use in future research to learn about, prevent, or treat other health problems (for example: diabetes, Alzheimer's disease, or heart disease)

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF text10
ReferenceDocuments.description: My tumor tissue may be kept for use in research to learn about, prevent, or treat other health problems (for example: diabetes, Alzheimer's disease, or heart disease).

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text9
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has given permission to store and use his/her tissue sample(s) for use in future research to learn about, prevent, or treat other health problems (for example: diabetes, Alzheimer's disease, or heart disease)

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has given permission to store and use his/her tissues sample(s) for use in future research to learn about, prevent, or treat other health problems (for example: diabetes, Alzheimer's disease, or heart disease)

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient consent to leftover tumor tissue that may be kept for research to learn about, prevent or treat other health problems (i.e: diabetes, Alzheimer's disease or heart disease)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient consent that tumor tissue and blood sample may be kept to learn about, prevent, or treat cancer or other health problems (for example: diabetes, Alzheimer's disease, or heart disease)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient agree to have tissue and/or blood sample kept (banked) for use in research to learn about, prevent, or treat cancer or other health problems as described in the optional research consent form?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 100
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient consent to having his/her tissue, blood, urine, and CSF samples kept (banked), for use in research, to learn about, prevent, or treat cancer, or other health problems (for example: diabetes, Alzheimer's disease, or heart disease)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 10
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient consent to having his/her tissue samples kept (banked), for use in research, to learn about, prevent, or treat cancer, or other health problems (for example: diabetes, Alzheimer's disease, or heart disease)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 11
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient consent to having his/her tissue, blood, and/or CSF samples kept (banked), for use in research, to learn about, prevent, or treat cancer, or other health problems (for example: diabetes, Alzheimer's disease, or heart disease)?

DataElement.origin: ACOSOG CRF:American College of Surgeons Oncology Group Case Report Form
DataElement.changeDescription: Replaced VD Specimen Research Consent Unrelated Ind-3 2189912v1.0 with VD ID#3506034 - Yes No Unknown Indicator  - dbw
